mapper.insert: INSERT INTO school_major (id, school_id,school_major_id,type, year, focus_major, special_major,lab_major,course_major,info,state,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{schoolId},#{schoolMajorId},#{type},#{year}, #{focusMajor},#{specialMajor},#{labMajor},#{courseMajor},#{info},#{state},NOW(),NOW())
